import React from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Button from "@mui/material/Button"; import DeleteIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Delete"; import IconButton from "@mui/material/IconButton"; import Tooltip from "@mui/material/Tooltip"; import EditIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Edit"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; import "./userProjects.css" const UserProjects = ({ projects, deleteProject }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); return ( <>

My Projects

  • Id
    Name
    Type
    Description
    Location
    Team Needed
    Level
  • {projects.length > 0 ? ( projects.map((project, id) => ( {id + 1} {project.name} {project.type} {project.desc} {project.location} {project.teamNeeded}
    {project.level}
    navigate(`/myprojects/edit/${project.id}`) } > deleteProject(project.id)}>
    )) ) : ( No projects found )}
{projects.length > 0 ? ( projects.map((project, id) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Id Name Type Description Location Team Needed Level
{id + 1} {project.name} {project.type} {project.desc} {project.location} {project.teamNeeded} {project.level} navigate(`/myprojects/edit/${project.id}`) } > deleteProject(project.id)} >
No projects found
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ projects: state, }); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ deleteProject: (id) => { dispatch({ type: "DELETE_PROJECT", payload: id }); }, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(UserProjects);
